recipesJson.name: Koffie Karamel
recipesJson.author: Screwdriver
recipesJson.description:
Howdy y'all, care for a special cup o' coffee. (Starbucks' style)
This is how I like my coffee, not too strong, with a little milk, sugar and caramel. 
Even adding some drops of my flavor concentrates to my every morning coffee, duh.
This Koffie Karamel you can shake and vape but will even get better after a few days... The caramel gets more forward.
Add Sweetener - Super Sweet to your preference, albeit a bit sweet as is.
I'm using a handmade slow vortexer (about 2 hours does the trick here) and heat it up to 45°C (113°F).
If you haven't got Kawa by Inawera, get it, you will not regret it.

Bavarian Cream (TPA) 1%
Butterscotch Ripple (FW) 0.5%
Caramel (FA) 0.75%
Caramel (Original) (TPA) 1.25%
Coconut (FA) 0.75%
Coffee Kawa (INAWERA) 1.25%
Cream Fresh (FA) 1.5%
French Vanilla (CAP) 1%
Meringue (FA) 1%
RY4 Double (TPA) 0.5%
Vanilla Shisha (INAWERA) 1.5%
(Super Sweet (CAP) 0.5%)

Enjoy enjoy,
Screwdriver
